plot outline: Jimmy Gallu is a 1982 Indian Kannada film, Directed by Ravi & Produced by Shashirekha. The film stars Vishnuvardhan, Sripriya in lead roles. The film had musical score by Vijaya Bhaskar. Watch the full movie, Jimmy Gallu, online, only on Eros Now.
